ABOUT_ME.TITLE: ABOUT ME
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION:
I am a passionate Frontend Developer from near Rosenheim, and I love creating innovative and creative solutions. Ever since I discovered coding, every project has been a new adventure that challenges and inspires me.
My focus is on designing modern, user-friendly, and visually appealing web applications. I enjoy working with the latest technologies and trends to create unique digital experiences. Clean code, performance, and a well-thought-out user experience are essential aspects of my work.
Whether it’s creative animations, interactive interfaces, or custom solutions – I am always excited about turning ideas into functional and aesthetic applications.

PROJECTS.TITLE: PROJECTS
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: I have gained experience in over 12 projects, working with JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular. I'm proficient in Git for version control and have used Firebase for backend services. With each project, I’ve improved my problem-solving skills and deepened my knowledge of modern web development.

DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: DEVELOPMENT
DEVELOPMENT.DESCRIPTION: My coding style is defined by efficiency, innovation, and adaptability. I craft clean, scalable solutions that seamlessly integrate modern best practices while prioritizing performance and maintainability. Every project I work on is designed with a mobile-first approach, ensuring a smooth user experience across all devices. I focus on implementing essential features intuitively, balancing functionality with elegant simplicity.

REMOTE.TITLE: REMOTE
REMOTE.DESCRIPTION: I am fully accustomed to working remotely, leveraging modern technology to collaborate seamlessly from anywhere. With the right tools and workflows, coding efficiently and staying connected with teams across different locations is second nature to me. This flexibility allows me to maintain high productivity while adapting to various project requirements and time zones.

JOIN.DESCRIPTION1: Join is a sophisticated task management app inspired by Kanban boards. It was developed in close collaboration with two other developers and helps teams efficiently organize their tasks.
JOIN.DESCRIPTION2: With drag-and-drop functionality, flexible categories, and an intuitive user interface, Join provides a seamless and efficient workflow. The app is optimized with Firebase for real-time data storage and designed to be fully responsive for both desktop and mobile devices.
JOIN.DESCRIPTION3: The development process was both technically and organizationally challenging, but it provided valuable insights into teamwork, UX design, and scalable architecture.

HOGWARTS_API.DESCRIPTION1: The Hogwarts API was used to create a dynamic website that displays data on characters, houses, and spells from the world of Harry Potter.
HOGWARTS_API.DESCRIPTION2: By leveraging RESTful API requests, the site fetches and presents structured information in an interactive and engaging way. Users can explore different aspects of the Harry Potter universe with a clear and responsive design.
HOGWARTS_API.DESCRIPTION3: The development focused on seamless API integration, efficient data handling, and an intuitive user experience, making the project both technically and creatively rewarding.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION1: El Pollo Loco is an entertaining 2D jump-and-run game where the player must dodge chickens and defeat dangerous enemies.
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION2: The game was developed using native JavaScript canvas elements and follows an object-oriented programming (OOP) approach to ensure clean and modular code.
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION3: With smooth animations, responsive controls, and engaging mechanics, El Pollo Loco delivers an immersive gameplay experience while demonstrating the power of OOP in game development.
